QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Change Original Amount Difference Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: find any sponsorship where the RI Sponsorship table value for original amount is not the same as the active current RG amount
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select --srs.ID srs.SPONSORSHIPID as ID , c.LOOKUPID as SponsorID , sc.LOOKUPID as SponsorshipCommitmentID , srs.REVENUELOOKUPID , srs.CHANGEYEAR , srs.INCREASERATE , srs.RESPONSEDATE , srs.RESPONDAFTERRATECHANGEUPDATED , srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT , srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT , (select dbo.USR_RESPONSE_AFTER_RATECHANGE_IMPLEMENTED_CODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_RESPONSE_AFTER_RATECHANGE_IMPLEMENTED_CODE where ID = srs.RESPONSEIFAFTERRATECHANGEIMPLEMENTEDCODEID) as RESPONSEIFAFTERIMPLEMENTATIONDESCRIPTION , srs.NOAPPEALRESPONSEDATE , (select dbo.USR_NO_RATEINCREASEAPPEAL_RESPONSECODE.[DESCRIPTION] from dbo.USR_NO_RATEINCREASEAPPEAL_RESPONSECODE where ID = srs.NOAPPEALRESPONSECODEID) as NOAPPEALRESPONSEDESCRIPTION , srs.SPONSORID as CONSTITUENTID , srs.SPONSORSHIPID , ft.ID as REVENUEID
from dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs
join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = srs.SPONSORID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.ID = srs.SPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s2 on s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = s2.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and s2.ISMOSTRECENTFORCOMMITMENT = 1 join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s2.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on rs.REVENUEID = ft.ID
where ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT <> ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT
